ygData.subject: Re: Article: IBM Blue Brain
ygData.msgSnippet: It s interesting they are doing this but it doesn t sound realistic at all.  Computing power seems to be the least of the challenges in modeling the human

It's interesting they are doing this but it doesn't sound realistic 
at all.  Computing power seems to be the least of the challenges 
in "modeling the human brain."  We hardly know anything past the 
primary visual areas, let alone neocortex.  Maybe the media is 
misunderstanding the actual goals of the project.  

ken
